rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C117741

self.title: CDISC SDTM Multiple Sclerosis Findings About Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test codes that describe multiple sclerosis findings.
name: Multiple Sclerosis Findings About Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Multiple Sclerosis Findings About Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Multiple Sclerosis Findings About Test Code

terms.definition: A description of the diagnostic criteria that the subject fulfilled in order to establish a medical diagnosis.
The anatomical location of the beginning or early stages of a disease.
A categorization of the number of lesions present in the Central Nervous System at the time of diagnosis of a specific disease.
